Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I hope some of you stick with me and decide to read this entire thing! 

Since the KSP forums are the nicest, and most helpful gaming community I've ever been a part of I figured I would start by asking here. I have a Youtube channel which I am trying to grow its fanbase and I believe with enough hard work it is possible. (will link it below) Since KSP forums has the best community I am asking for your help! With the youtube channel comes the need for a cover photo to represent your channel along with a cool looking logo! See where this is going yet? I have very very limited image editing and enhancing skills and could use some assistance in creating a cover photo and a cool logo. Both of which will need to represent my channel which covers video games but mainly KSP. (right now waiting for the KSP 1.0 update to upload any more KSP videos.) 

I do want to apologize ahead of time if the mods frown upon this thread, I just didn't know where else to ask for help from the mass KSP community. 

If your still reading you must be a little interested at this point right? So you may be wondering, "Okay, well what kind of design do you want?" See... I do not know, I am not that creative of a person and really just would rather be surprised by what you all can come up with rather than me trying to describe what I would want when I doubt it will look as good. 

Last paragraph! You may be wondering, "Whats in it for me?" I cannot promise payment, (yes I am asking out of the goodness of everyones heart.) However, I can promise recognition. For example, mentioning your forum name on my website plus in a new video after the pictures have been updated. Also if you have a forum thread where you do image editing and making images look all pretty. That will be linked in a overlay in a video, on the website and mentioned in video.

Again guys, I'm just asking for a little help when I could use it! Thank you for reading!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-21T17:01:09Z" title="03/21/2015 05:01  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 21, 2015</time> by 7499275**
